author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 559 cadres, including 31 women, of Manithaneya Makkal Munnetra Kazhagam were arrested here on Sunday while attempting to besiege the Palayamkottai central prison.

The agitation was led by Palai S. Rabik, founder-president of MMMK.

He said the agitation was organised seeking the attention of government demanding the release of 49 Muslims, who had been lodged in prison for over 10 years “for no concrete reason.”

While there were demands for the release of the accused in the assassination of former Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi, the MMMK cadres had come forward now seeking the release of 49 Muslims, who had been languishing in prison for several years.

He said families and relatives of these incarcerated Muslims were in tears without their breadwinners, he said.
title: 559 MMMK cadres arrested
